Material used.Description: Inducible PC12/TetOn cells overexpressing wild-type or A30P mutant alpha-synuclein

Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutant showed increased aggregation and cytotoxicity compared to wild-type under stress conditions
A30P mutant exhibited heightened sensitivity to proteasome inhibition (MG132) compared to wild-type
